dataTemplate.name: XXPATSKS
dataTemplate.description: OD General Project Task Status Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1)) InProgress, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1)) compl, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1)) NS, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)) OH, a.task_manager FROM apps.fnd_user e, apps.PA_STRUCTURES_TASKS_V a, apps.pa_project_statuses d, apps.pa_projects_all c where c.template_flag='N' and d.project_status_code=c.project_status_code and d.project_status_name not in ('Closed','Cancelled','Rejected','On Hold') and a.project_id=c.project_id and a.latest_eff_published_flag='Y' AND a.object_type = 'PA_TASKS' AND TRUNC(a.scheduled_finish_date)<=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND length(a.element_number)<=4 and e.employee_id=a.task_manager_id and e.user_name NOT LIKE '8%' group by a.task_manager order by a.task_manager

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1)) InProgress, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1)) compl, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1)) NS, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)) OH, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)) total, DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))) totalnew, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) inpr, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) compr, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) nspr, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) ohpr FROM apps.fnd_user e, apps.PA_STRUCTURES_TASKS_V a, apps.pa_project_statuses d, apps.pa_projects_all c where c.template_flag='N' and d.project_status_code=c.project_status_code and d.project_status_name not in ('Closed','Cancelled','Rejected','On Hold') and a.project_id=c.project_id and a.latest_eff_published_flag='Y' AND a.object_type = 'PA_TASKS' AND TRUNC(a.scheduled_finish_date)<=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND length(a.element_number)<=4 and e.employee_id=a.task_manager_id and e.user_name NOT LIKE '8%'

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1)) InProgress, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1)) compl, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1)) NS, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)) OH, a.task_manager FROM apps.fnd_user e, apps.PA_STRUCTURES_TASKS_V a, apps.pa_project_statuses d, apps.pa_projects_all c where c.template_flag='N' and d.project_status_code=c.project_status_code and d.project_status_name not in ('Closed','Cancelled','Rejected','On Hold') and a.project_id=c.project_id and a.latest_eff_published_flag='Y' AND a.object_type = 'PA_TASKS' AND TRUNC(a.scheduled_finish_date)<=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND length(a.element_number)<=4 and e.employee_id=a.task_manager_id and e.user_name LIKE '8%' group by a.task_manager order by a.task_manager

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1)) InProgress, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1)) compl, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1)) NS, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)) OH, COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)) total, DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))) totalnew, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) inpr, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) compr, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) nspr, ROUND((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))/ DECODE((COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1))),0,1, (COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'In Progress',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Completed',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'Not Started',1))+ COUNT(DECODE(a.task_status_meaning,'On Hold',1)))))*100,2) ohpr FROM apps.fnd_user e, apps.PA_STRUCTURES_TASKS_V a, apps.pa_project_statuses d, apps.pa_projects_all c where c.template_flag='N' and d.project_status_code=c.project_status_code and d.project_status_name not in ('Closed','Cancelled','Rejected','On Hold') and a.project_id=c.project_id and a.latest_eff_published_flag='Y' AND a.object_type = 'PA_TASKS' AND TRUNC(a.scheduled_finish_date)<=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND length(a.element_number)<=4 and e.employee_id=a.task_manager_id and e.user_name LIKE '8%'
